Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to disclose previous visa denial
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Immigration Officer erred in assessing the applicant's ties to India
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Application for temporary resident work permit
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Insufficient assessment of ties to home country
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Officer's focus on higher Canadian salary while ignoring strong ties to India
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to consider all relevant factors demonstrating ties to India
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Burden on applicant to demonstrate intent to leave Canada after authorized stay
Crimes.Application_Factor: Perceived lack of ties to India
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 20(1)(b)
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Did the Officer err in concluding insufficient ties to India?
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Paragraph 20(1)(b) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Case remanded for reconsideration by a different officer
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Judicial review under section 72 of the Act
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose prior visa denial

Crimes.Crime_Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Immigration Officer erred in concluding insufficient ties to India
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Inadequate evaluation of applicantâ€™s residential ties to India
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Overemphasis on higher Canadian salary, disregard of strong Indian ties
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to holistically assess ties to home country
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Applicant must show intention to leave Canada at end of authorized stay
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 20(1)(b)
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Did the Officer err in concluding insufficient ties to India?
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Paragraph 20(1)(b) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Case remanded for reconsideration by a different officer
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Perceived insufficient ties to India despite strong familial, financial, and academic connections
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to consider all relevant evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Lack of comprehensive analysis by decision maker
